review: a very good collab with castelvania

this dlc is amazing adds more biomes bosses it add everything adn well made there are a lot of weapons from this dlc i love there is also the cat very good i like the boss fights the sound tracks and outfits the alternate mode is cool and the other storyline is very good i really reccomend it
by far my personal best dlc i have ever played

i have every dlc but this one added nothing new but the really hard boss which is good every other mob is a reskin from older mobs i just cannot get to like this one maybe because i am not a castlevania fan

i had a lot of fun with most of the content added by this dlc 3 new main maps while 2 of them are variations of one a new 1st tier boss and final boss and a bonus game  map the maps look great and gamewide objects like chests or shops are redesigned for the castlevania maps all enemies feel fair to fight against even if some are challenging and quite an amount of added weapons  skills work as good choices for playthroughs in general
same mechanics same biomes just changing the assests and adding few lines of dialogue
as someone who barely knows anything about castlevania this dlc is fire and so is the base game
solid dlc with good enemy variety challenging bosses and castlevania references

have bought the entire base game and dlc but i regret this one its garbage ive had castlevania arcade standups and countless cv from us and jp across multiple systems i love dead cells but skip this dlcs please

bad dlc fewer new weapons and enemies than the previous dlc even though it costs the same as the game itself also this addon doesnt expand games lore cuz it takes place in castlevania i dont recommend
the best dlc

honestly i dont care about castlevania certainly doesnt help that this cameo is probably the best thing the series has had to offer in over a decade i say probably because i have no frame of reference to judge pachinko machines or whatever it is konamis been blowing their goodwill on  regardless with the game finally sunsetting i cant think of another developer thats earned a bonus purchase more
i bought dead cells just for this expansion and it was worth it its just an amazing dlc and everything a fan of castlevania would want well that and symphony of the night on steam buy it
i really like the soundtracks
great addition to an awesome game

probably my favorite dlc so far amazing soundtracks fun weapons great biomes really good bosses and so many references and homage to classic castlevania titles my only gripe with this is the weird pathing of it once you go to the castle outskirts you cannot leave the dlc areas until after you beat death still not a real big deal for me personally but its still weird
